answers.answer: I'm diabetic. You manage it the baby will be fine!! My girls are healthy as can be and I was diabetic both times.
Are you diabetic or just have GD? My doctor told me today I will be diabetic after my baby is born

Were you diabetic before you got pregnant? You could have gestational diabetes which usually goes away after you give birth. I don't know how the dr would know if you would be diabetic after you give birth if you weren't before.
I had GD with my first and developed type 2 diabetes shortly after so I'm pretty existing diabetes with this pregnancy.
I wasn't diabetic before now.but my doctor said that I will be diabetic for now on.

question: I found out today that I will be diabetic after I have my baby :( anyone else diabetic? If I diet and stuff and take my medication will my baby be okay.
title: diabetes
